Joyner Library has a selection of  inlibrary laptop checkouts for ECU students PERIOD The Music Library in the Fletcher Building also has five laptops PERIOD These laptops are loaned and used for students personal uses around the libraries PERIOD

These laptops have the same programs as the lab computers in the libraries and include a wireless card for internet access PERIOD Headphones are also available for inlibrary checkout PERIOD

 said Interim Head of the Systems Department Ann Stocks PERIOD

Currently enrolled ECU students may loan a laptop once daily for a period of  hours or until  minutes before the library closes PERIOD

The 12hour check out period for laptops has been in effect since Aug PERIOD   PERIOD

 said Interim Associate Director Jan Lewis PERIOD

According to Lewis the main advantages to students checking out laptops is that they can work in the group study rooms or quiet study spaces and bring the laptop into those areas PERIOD

A laptop loan includes the laptop power cord mouse mouse pad and external floppy drive in a carrying case PERIOD

The laptops are Windows operated systems and have Microsoft Office which includes Internet Explorer PERIOD Users may not add or remove any software PERIOD

If a laptop user needs to use a printer they can send their work to a networked printer within the building and pay the current rate PERIOD

If a users laptop is damaged they will be sent a bill for the repair PERIOD This fee is then placed on the users student university record PERIOD

There are also overdue fines and replacement fees for the laptops PERIOD For every hour the laptop is overdue there is a  fine PERIOD These fines can add up to a maximum total of  PERIOD If laptop is not returned there is a  replacement fee PERIOD

If a borrower receives an overdue fine they will also receive a tag by noon of the next day PERIOD

The  laptops were purchased with money from the librarys equipment budget PERIOD

 Lewis said PERIOD

If all the laptops are checked out at once there is no wait list PERIOD Students just need to keep checking back to see if one has been returned or when it is due PERIOD

 said Access Services evening supervisor David Hisle PERIOD

From July  until January  the laptops had circulated  times PERIOD Within the same time frame this year the laptops have circulated  times PERIOD This is a  percent increase this year PERIOD

Borrowers are expected to read and follow ECUs  This can be viewed at ecu.educsitcspoliciesstaffstudentpolicy.cfm PERIOD
